availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John G. Stanton (Russell County, Kentucky, farmer, constable, and soldier.)

body.p: Russell County, Kentucky, farmer, constable, and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of William Stanton and Phebe Stanton. Married to Mary L. Holt Stanton in Russell County, Kentucky, on November 7, 1862. Farmer in Russell County in 1850. Farmer in Russell County in 1860. Constable of Russell County in 1862. Farmer in Russell County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Russell County, District 2, p. 240B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Russell County, Russell, p. 661.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Russell County, KY, February 1864.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Russell County Marriages, p. 138-139.
KYR-0001-029-0059.
